title: typefaces and song lyrics
content:
hey, has anybody thought about names of typefaces appearing in pop songs. and - if they do appear - does that mean anything? like, is there some spiritual insight when type and music link?

take this for instance: i've always considered the HOBO being one of the most useless faces around, still it keeps popping up. then today, i found the song "hobo blues" by jack johnson - perfect fit or mere coincidence?

listen to this (hope it works...)

[http://www.amazon.com/gp/music/wma-pop-up/B0000UX5IY001004/ref=mu\_sam\_wm...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021020900/http:/www.amazon.com/gp/music/wma-pop-up/B0000UX5IY001004/ref=mu_sam_wma_001_004/002-8441353-0353604 "http://www.amazon.com/gp/music/wma-pop-up/B0000UX5IY001004/ref=mu\_sam\_wma\_001\_004/002-8441353-0353604")

does anybody else see the connection?

cheers,  
curtze
author: curtze
